entry.title: RENEW Toner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bare Nature
Type: Facial Toner
Price: 20.00

Toners are a valuable part of your skincare routine. RENEW Toner restores moisture to the skin and improves texture. Apply to a clean face to help your skin absorb the nourishing benefits. Hydrating and corrective toner.

Ingredients

Water, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Distillate, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile) Flower Water, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Water, Eco-Certified Preservative (Geogard), Boswellia Thurifera (Frankincense) Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil.

entry.title: CLARITY Toner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bare Nature
Type: Facial Toner
Price: 20.00

The second step in your skincare regimen helps to minimize the amount of dirt/oil/bacteria that gets back into your pores. Mist over your face to rebalance and gently minimize pores.  For oily and acne prone skin types.

Ingredients

Water, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Distillate,  Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile) Flower Water, Colloidal Silver, Eco-Certified Preservative (Geogard), Eucalyptus Globulus Oil, Melaleuca Alernifolia (Tea Tree) Oil Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove Leaf) Oil.

entry.title: BALANCE Toner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bare Nature
Type: Facial Toner
Price: 20.00

Toners are a valuable part of your skincare routine. BALANCE Toner restores moisture to the skin and improves texture. Apply to a clean face to help your skin absorb the nourishing benefits of your serum and moisturizer. Lightweight and clarifying.

Ingredients

Water, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Distillate, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile) Flower Water, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Water, Colloidal Silver, Eco-Certified Preservative (Geogard), Boswellia Thurifera (Frankincense) Oil, Cananga Odorata (Ylang Ylang) Oil, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove Leaf) Oil.

entry.title: Face Mask Mist
entry.summary:
Vendor: Taurah
Type: Face Mask Mist
Price: 18.00

Welcome to the natural face mask mist solution created by Taurah. This 40 ml mist creates a toning and hydrating barrier between your mask and your skin. 

Features + Benefits

  • Anti-bacterial and toning
  • Boosts hydration
  • Rich in Vitamin E to give a healthy looking complexion to your skin
  • Moisturizing agent that contains Vitamin B complex, Vitamin C, folic acid, and caroten

Ingredients

Organic witch hazel, hydrating jojoba oil, aloe vera juice, rose floral water, lavender essential oil and sweet orange essential oil.

entry.title: Cooling Mist
entry.summary:
Vendor: Taurah
Type: Essential Oil Spray
Price: 22.00

The Cooling Mist brings you the fresh feeling you crave post-workout. The 60 ml spray bottle is filled with a refreshing aloe vera, cucumber and spearmint blend to spray as a facial mist, body mist, and aromatic mist post-movement. 

Ingredients

Distilled Water, Aloe Vera Juice, Cucumber Extract, Essential Oil Blend (Cucumber, Spearmint)

Store in a cool, dry place. Shelf life of 12 months.

entry.title: Calming Mist
entry.summary:
Vendor: Taurah
Type: Essential Oil Spray
Price: 22.00

The Calming Mist brings you the focused, meditative feeling you are searching for.
The 60 ml spray bottle is filled with a calming aromatic blend promoting a relaxing atmosphere to uplift your environment while easing the mind.  
Use this spray as a facial mist, body mist, and aromatic mist. 

Ingredients

Distilled Water, Essential Oil Blend (Lavender, Bergamot, Frankincense, Wild Orange)

Store in a cool, dry place. Shelf life of 12 months.

entry.title: Settle Down Essential Oil Spray + Toner
entry.summary:
Vendor: K'Pure Naturals
Type: Essential Oil Sprays
Price: 9.00

Settle Down is a calming spray for pillow, face and body.  A great addition to the entire family's bedtime routine, and we've added witch hazel and coconut oil, so it also doubles as a hydrating facial toner with a blend of organic essential oils including lavender. 

Ingredients

Purified water, organic witch hazel, coconut oil and a blend of pure and organic essential oils including lavender.

entry.title: Time Out Uplifting Essential Oil Spray + Toner
entry.summary:
Vendor: K'Pure Naturals
Type: Essential Oil Sprays
Price: 9.00

For that magical time between coffee and wine o'clock, Time Out uplifting organic essential oil spray.  Use this as a hydrating facial toner, body spray, room spray or mist the kids as they walk through the front door after school.  

Ingredients

Purified water, organic witch hazel, coconut oil, patchouli, orange, bergamot, almond and other pure, organic essential oils.

entry.title: Chill Out Aloe Vera Mist Essential Oil Spray + Toner
entry.summary:
Vendor: K'Pure Naturals
Type: Essential Oil Sprays
Price: 9.00

A refreshing and soothing blend of aloe vera, organic witch hazel and pure, organic essential oils.  Use this cooling mist before, during and after those long summer days. For an extra cooling experience, store Chill Out in the fridge.  Chill Out can also be used as a hydrating facial toner  

Ingredients

Purified water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, organic Hamamelis Virginiana (witch hazel) and a blend of pure and organic essential oils.

entry.title: Deep Breath Soothing Essential Oil Spray + Toner
entry.summary:
Vendor: K'Pure Naturals
Type: Essential Oil Sprays
Price: 9.00

Deep Breath contains a blend of organic essential oils, including eucalyptus, lime and peppermint.   Great for cold and flu season, stressful situations or any time a breath of fresh air is all you need.  With the addition of witch hazel and coconut oil, you can use Deep Breath as a hydrating facial toner and a soothing room and body spray.  

Ingredients

Purified water, organic witch hazel, coconut oil and a blend of pure and organic essential oils including peppermint, eucalyptus and citrus.

entry.title: Good Morning Essential Oil Spray + Toner
entry.summary:
Vendor: K'Pure Naturals
Type: Essential Oil Sprays
Price: 9.00

An all-natural and organic aromatherapy spray, perfect for those rough mornings (afternoons, evenings....) due to pregnancy or an overindulgent evening.  With an blend of pure and organic essential oils, Good Morning can be used from head to toe, allowing the refreshing blend of grapefruit, ginger and spearmint to soothe and refresh.  

Ingredients

Purified water, hamamelis virginiana (witch hazel)* , cocos nucifera (coconut) oil and a blend of pure, organic essential oils.*

*organic ingredients

entry.title: Keep Going Energizing Essential Oil Spray + Toner
entry.summary:
Vendor: K'Pure Naturals
Type: Essential Oil Sprays
Price: 9.00

Keep Going is a refreshing blend of lemon, spearmint and other organic essential oils. Ideal for before, during and after workouts or when the 3pm slump hits. Organic witch hazel and coconut oil make it the perfect hydrating facial toner, that can also be used as a body spray, room spray and gym bag spray.  

Ingredients

Purified water, organic hamamelis virginiana (witch hazel) , capric triglyceride (coconut oil) and a blend pure, organic essential oils, including spearmint and lemon.

entry.title: Eucalyptus Mood Mist Natural Essential Oil Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mifa & Co.
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 38.00

Refresh-Purify-Soothe

3.4oz / 100ml

MIFA’s 100% natural essential oil spray, EUCALYPTUS MOOD MIST, is a versatile essential oil blend that is grounding, uplifting, and refreshing. Created to restore, refresh and reset your experience by encouraging daily connection to self, deep breathing and relaxation.

A purifying blend of Bulgarian lavender water, witch hazel, eucalyptus, and tea tree essential oils.  Spray across your face, body, bedding or in the shower to inhale or as a room spray to subtly scent.

It’s a wonderful ritual that will encourage deep breaths and reset your mood. 

As seen in Elle Canada, Fashion Magazine, Montecristo, VITA Daily, and Vancouver Sun.

Key Ingredients

Bulgarian Lavender Water – Steam distilled lavender water that it's calming and uplifting scent that will reduce anxiety and stress. It is the most soothing scent a person can experience.

Eucalyptus – Best known for its refreshing scent. It is a miracle plant that boosts mental clarity, while the healing properties will stimulate your immune system. An essential oil with antibacterial and anti-fungal properties. 

Lavender – Prized around the world since ancient times, the smoky, herbal scent of this flowering plant calms the mind and soothes the senses.  

Full Ingredients List

Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Water, Witch Hazel Distillate (Extrait de Noisetier)*, Eucalyptus Globulus (Eucalyptus) Oil*, Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender) Oil*, Phenethyl Alcohol (L'alcool Phenethyl)**, Melaleuca Alternifolia Leaf (Tea Tree/Théier) Oil*

 *CERTIFIED ORGANIC INGREDIENTS/ Ingrédients Certifiés Organiques **Plant based preservative (conservateur à base de plantes) 

Recommended Use

Always shake before use to disperse oils. Spray 6 inches away from the face and inhale. Mist onto face, body or use as a room/pillow spray. 

Caution: Do not take internally. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. 

Product Information

Cruelty-Free, Toxin-Free, Sulfate-Free, Paraben-Free, Gluten-Free, Soy-Free, Phthalate-Free, Fragrance-Free, Palm Oil-Free, Vegan.
